EN:

original:
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大で20消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[BloodScissor]1を得て精神力を3回復。
- このスキルで[BloodDinner]を消耗できなければ、[Laceration]30を得る
[WhenUse] 対象の[Laceration]が6以上なら、マッチ威力 +1
[WhenUse] 自分の[Laceration]5につき、コイン威力 +1(最大2)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大で20消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[BloodScissor]1を得て精神力を3回復。
- このスキルで[BloodDinner]を消耗できなければ、[Laceration]30を得る
[WhenUse] 対象の[Laceration]が6以上なら、マッチ威力 +1
[WhenUse] 自分の[Laceration]5につき、コイン威力 +1(最大2)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]을 최대 20 소모하여, 소모한 [BloodDinner] 10당 [BloodScissor] 1 얻고 정신력 3 회복.
- 이 스킬에서 [BloodDinner]을 소모하지 못했으면, [Laceration] 30을 얻음
[WhenUse] 대상의 [Laceration]이 6 이상이면, 합 위력 +1
[WhenUse] 자신의 [Laceration] 5 당, 코인 위력 +1 (최대 2)
EN:
[WhenUse] Consume up to 20 [BloodDinner]; gain 1 [BloodScissor] and heal 3 SP for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner] with this Skill, gain 30 [Laceration]
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Clash Power +1
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Laceration] on self (max 2)

original:

[WhenUse] 対象に[LineCutting]があれば、マッチ威力 +5
[LineCutting]へ的中するたびに精神力を5回復
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大30消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[BloodScissor]1を得て精神力を3回復
[WhenUse] 対象に[LineCutting]があれば、マッチ威力 +5

<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:

[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]을 최대 30 소모하여, 소모한 [BloodDinner] 10당 [BloodScissor] 1 얻고 정신력 3 회복
[WhenUse] 대상에게 [LineCutting]이 있으면, 합 위력 +5
[LineCutting]에게 적중 시마다 정신력 5 회복
EN:
[WhenUse] Consume up to 30 [BloodDinner]; gain 1 [BloodScissor] and heal 3 SP for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed
[WhenUse] If target has [LineCutting], Clash Power +5
Heal 5 SP on every hit against [LineCutting]

original:
[BeforeAttack] [BloodScissor]段階に比例して攻撃加重値 +1(最大2)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大30消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[BloodScissor]1を得て精神力を3回復
[WhenUse] 対象の[Laceration]が6以上なら、マッチ威力 +2
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[BeforeAttack] [BloodScissor]段階に比例して攻撃加重値 +1(最大2)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大30消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[BloodScissor]1を得て精神力を3回復
[WhenUse] 対象の[Laceration]が6以上なら、マッチ威力 +2
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[BeforeAttack] [BloodScissor] 단계에 비례하여 공격 가중치 +1 (최대 2)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]을 최대 30 소모하여, 소모한 [BloodDinner] 10당 [BloodScissor] 1 얻고 정신력 3 회복
[WhenUse] 대상의 [Laceration]이 6 이상이면, 합 위력 +2
EN:
[BeforeAttack] Atk Weight +1 for every Stage of [BloodScissor] (max 2)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 30 [BloodDinner]; gain 1 [BloodScissor] and heal 3 SP for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Clash Power +2

original:
[BeforeAttack] [BloodScissor]段階に比例して攻撃加重値 +1
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大100消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[BloodScissor]1を得て精神力を3回復
[EndSkill] [BloodScissor]を10消耗
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[BeforeAttack] [BloodScissor]段階に比例して攻撃加重値 +1
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大100消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[BloodScissor]1を得て精神力を3回復
[EndSkill] [BloodScissor]を10消耗
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[BeforeAttack] [BloodScissor] 단계에 비례하여 공격 가중치 +1
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]을 최대 100 소모하여, 소모한 [BloodDinner] 10당 [BloodScissor] 1 얻고 정신력 3 회복
[EndSkill] [BloodScissor] 10 소모
EN:
[BeforeAttack] Atk Weight +1 for every Stage of [BloodScissor]
[WhenUse] Consume up to 100 [BloodDinner]; gain 1 [BloodScissor] and heal 3 SP for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Clash Power +2
[EndSkill] Consume 10 [BloodScissor]
